src/connectorsFunctions/catalog/ConnectorFunctions.js
ConnectorFunctions
description: This is a base object than contains all you can about connector functions catalog

name: withDescription
description: Description of the connector function. This field is optional.

name: withOperationName
description: Used to filter connector functions by operation name. If Connector Function type is REQUEST, this field is mandatory and defined name must be an operation name available for specified Api Key. If the type is COLLECTION or RESPONSE, this field must be null.

name: withType
description:
Type of connector function, this is mandatory. Keep in mind that you will be not allowed to modify it.
Allowed: COLLECTION┃REQUEST┃RESPONSE

name: withCloneable
description: Indicates whether or not the Connector Function is cloneable.

name: withNorthCriterias
description: Connector Function selection criteria for operation requests. This field is mandatory if Connector Function type is REQUEST. ⮕ [ each element is defined by path and value ]

name: addNorthCriteria
description: Add northCriteria to parameter northCriterias. Each element is defined by path and value

name: withSouthCriterias
description: Connector Function selection criteria for operation responses and data collection. This field is mandatory if Connector Function type is COLLECTION or RESPONSE. ⮕ [ each string can represent an URI, topic, OID... ]. Each string can represent an URI, topic, OID...

name: addSouthCriteria
description: Add southCriteria to parameter southCriterias. Each string can represent an URI, topic, OID...

name: withPayloadType
description:
Enum of allowed types for connector function's payload data. Request Connector Functions only accept JSON. 
Allowed: TEXT┃JSON┃BINARY

name: create
description: Create a new connector function catalog
